snowbound.api

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • snowbound.api.Entity<Unit>
      • snowbound.api.Unit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Positionable

    public class Unit
extends Entity<Unit>
implements Positionable
    The state of a unit at a specific turn, including the team, perk, position, warmth, and number of snowballs.

    Instances of the Unit class will not be updated as the game progresses. If you have a reference to a unit from a previous turn, the current turn can provide you with the most up-to-date version.
